Synopsis: Retrieves computer system information from remote computers.
Description: This function retrieves computer system information from remote computers using CIM/WMI queries.
Notes: This function uses CIM/WMI queries to gather system information from remote computers.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerSystem -ComputerName AD1, AD2, EVO1, ADFFS | ft -a *
Retrieves computer system information for the specified computers and displays it in a table format.
